name: iOS 14.4.2 and iPadOS 14.4.2
available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to universal cross site scripting. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by improved management of object lifetimes.

cves.credit: Clement Lecigne of Google Threat Analysis Group and Billy Leonard of Google Threat Analysis Group
